knimeNode.name: Inductive Miner (DFG Legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node mines a process tree from directly-follows model with implicit Inductive Miner.

fullDescription.intro: Inductive Miner (DFG) discovers a process model in process tree from input of a directly-follows model. Inductive Miner is the mining algorithm.
fullDescription.option: The event classifier is chosen to classify the event log.
The variant type of Inductive Miner is used to mine one process tree from one directly-follows graph.
Noise threshold is used to set the fitting trace percent with respect to the new model. 0.8 is as the default value.

ports.outPort: The discovered process model in process tree.
